title.en: Prayer to Gyaltsen Tsemö Pung Gyen1

text.en: Oṃ! We take refuge in the gurus, the yidams, and in you, Gyaltsen Tsemö Pung Gyen,
text.en-trans: om, guru yidam gyaltsen tsemö tok
pung gyen lhatsok khyé la kyab su chi

text.en: By the power of this fervent prayer of ours,
text.en-trans: dakchak nying né solwa tabpé tü

text.en: Quickly protect us from all failure and misfortune!
text.en-trans: güpa kün lé nyurdu kyab tu sol

text.en: O Pung Gyen, and your retinue:
text.en-trans: pung gyen lhatsok khyé kyi dzutrul tü

text.en: With the force of your magical display, for us, our benefactors, and all those around us
text.en-trans: dak dang gyujor yöndak khor ché la

text.en: Avert all bad dreams, and those who have ill thoughts or do us harm!
text.en-trans: milam ngen dang sam ngen jor tsub dok

text.en: Avert spells and curses, dispute and conflict!
Avert all weakening in our life force, body,wangtangand windhorse!
text.en-trans: sok lü wangtang lungta güpa dok

text.en: Avert all illness in men and women, all loss of our resources!
text.en-trans: mi la natsa chuk la gökha dok

text.en: Grant us long life, merit, glory and renown, and
text.en-trans: tsé dang sönam pal dang drakpa sok

text.en: Make peace and happiness reign, throughout both day and night!
text.en-trans: nyintsen küntu delek dzé du sol
